title: Crock-Pot 20-Ounce Electric Lunch Box, Portable Food Warmer, Faded Blue, Perfect for Travel, Car, On-the-Go, Keeps Food Warm, Spill-Free, Dishwasher-Safe, Ideal Gift for Men and Women
features: Ideal Personal Size: Convenient 20-oz. size perfect for transporting and warming up individual meals
Seal & Store Lid: Prevents spills while on the move
Stylish Design: Features a modern-vintage aesthetic in Black Licorice finish
Soft-Touch Exterior: Enhanced with a matte rubberized coating for a modern soft-touch feel
Dishwasher-Safe: Inner food storage container and lid are dishwasher-safe for easy clean-up
